Description: In this auction you are bidding on : ..... VINTAGE ANDRE RIVALLE 17 JEWELS POCKET WATCH - EXCELLENT.... This came from the collection of a local Pocket Watch Collector. The Watch Winds and Runs Excellent. The Movement is marked: 17 SEVENTEEN .JEWELS UNADJUSTED SWISS MADE E. GLUCK CORP YY The inside of the back Case is marked: E. GLUCK CORP BASE METAL SWISS The inside of the front Cover is engraved: R.P.W., 8-19-82. The Face measures 1.5” in diameter. Has an 12” Long Chain. Works Excellent. EXCELLENT CONDITION. Payment may be via Pay Pal. Buyer also agrees to pay actual shipping and insurance charges. TERMS & CONDITIONS Your satisfaction with your auction win is my prime concern. I assure you the item you receive was described to the best of my ability and knowledge and is as pictured with no attempt to conceal flaws or damage. However.....if you are not happy with your purchase you may return it for a full refund of your bid price by following these 3 simple requests: 1) Contact me within 3 days of receiving your purchase and let me know of your intent to return. 2) Pack the item securely and return it to me via USPS Priority Insured mail with Delivery Confirmation. 3) Please email me the Delivery Confirmation number. Once the item is in my hands and I verify it is the same item shipped to you (yes regretfully there are those who have switched items on me hence everyone must suffer due to the few bad eggs) I will issue you a refund of your bid price by PayPal. Please note....I am sorry, but only your BID PRICE is refundable. The shipping fees go to the postal service and are not mine to refund. If you feel you cannot adhere to these rules to avoid any conflict, please do us both a favor and place your bid on another sellers item. Normal 0 false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE
